DOCNAME: KOLMAN AND OTHERS v. THE CZECH REPUBLIC
JUDGES: Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Snejana Botoucharova;Volodymyr Butkevych
TEXT: Mr PERSON , PERSON , PERSON and ORG are CARDINAL NORP nationals , born in DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE , and living in GPE and GPE , respectively . They were represented before ORG , a lawyer practising in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , Mr PERSON , from ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the ORG father brought an action in the GPE CARDINAL ORG ( obvodní soud ) for recovery of property pursuant to LAW .
The restitution proceedings terminated in a decision of ORG ( PERSON ) of DATE which was notified to the ORG representative on CARDINAL DATE .
On DATE the applicants applied for compensation pursuant to Act no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL as amended .

The relevant domestic law and practice concerning remedies for the allegedly excessive length of judicial proceedings are set out in the ORG ’s decision in the case of PERSON v. GPE , no . MONEY ( dec . ) , § § CARDINAL - CARDINAL , DATE ) .
